extendedInfo.description: How to use Construction Sound Effects:You have different real sound effects to choose from to play the sound of the Construction sound effect you need to tap on the images of the Construction and it will make sound and if you want to save it as ringtone you just tap and hold it make sure to rate the app thanks

reviews.title: Good to try make people think your busy
reviews.comment: Boss calls work phone... I open the app and bang noise. When actually I\'m reading the paper  This has never happened as I\'m always to busy but one day...
reviews.author: Matthew Dallas
